publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1119 Peter Peacock: School Education (Ministerial Powers and Independent Schools) (Scotland) Bill-That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the School Education (Ministerial Powers and Independent Schools) (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Euan Robson*
